name: Rewinded Fate
description:
Rewinded Fate

The human is a faithful one who has always prayed to you, an Angel of Miracle, all his time. However he is an unlucky one, he is fated to die in this week. He is still too young to die, so you feel pity for him and decide to take him as a client, a client to be saved from his hapless fate.

Gameplay: You have to avoid the accident using your abilities. Some accidents can be avoided using multiple abilities.

Controls: Only mouse click.

Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen

A game by Chavafei (Artist), HardRain (Programmer), and mrbutternice (Composer). Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 96: Fate
